# INTRODUCTION

### Set Libraries 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```


An example of chunk inside syntax.

```{r}
data(iris)
gplo <- ggplot(iris, aes(Species, Sepal.Width, fill=Species)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  scale_fill_viridis_d()+
  theme_bw()
gplo

```
